mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT LAW_COMPETITION_RECORD.*, LAW_USER.ORG_CODE FROM LAW_COMPETITION_RECORD, LAW_USER WHERE LAW_COMPETITION_RECORD.USER_ID = LAW_USER. ID ) where org_code=#{deptcode}
SELECT "SUM" (score) FROM ( SELECT LAW_COMPETITION_RECORD.*, LAW_USER.ORG_CODE FROM LAW_COMPETITION_RECORD, LAW_USER WHERE LAW_COMPETITION_RECORD.USER_ID = LAW_USER. ID ) WHERE org_code = #{deptcode}

SELECT ttt.user_id AS "userId", USERID2NAME(ttt.user_id) AS "userName", ttt.score AS "score", ttt.how_big AS "howBig", ttt.how_lit AS "howLit", ttt.create_time AS "createTime" FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT LAW_COMPETITION_RECORD.*, ROW_NUMBER () OVER ( PARTITION BY USER_ID ORDER BY HOW_BIG DESC, HOW_LIT DESC ) rn FROM LAW_COMPETITION_RECORD WHERE LAW_COMPETITION_RECORD.STATUS = '1' AND LAW_COMPETITION_RECORD.SCORE != '0' ) WHERE rn = 1 ) ttt ORDER BY ttt.HOW_BIG DESC, ttt.HOW_LIT DESC, ttt.USER_ID DESC, ttt.create_time
